title: Visual Studio Code Official Repository
body:
Official Visual Studio Code repository: https://github.com/microsoft/vscode

The official open-source repository for Visual Studio Code containing the full source code for the VS Code editor. Actively maintained by Microsoft with community contributions. Use this repo for VS Code issues, feature requests, and understanding the codebase architecture.
semanticSummary: Official Visual Studio Code repository: https://github.com/microsoft/vscode
